quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh
quotes.quote: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.

quotes.author: Lao Tzu
quotes.quote: Silence is a source of great strength.

quotes.author: Bodhidharma
quotes.quote: Not engaging in ignorance is wisdom.

quotes.author: Dogen
quotes.quote: To study Buddhism is to study ourselves. To study ourselves is to forget ourselves.

quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki
quotes.quote: In the beginner’s mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert’s there are few.

quotes.author: Alan Watts
quotes.quote: Muddy water is best cleared by leaving it alone.

quotes.author: Zen Proverb
quotes.quote: When the student is ready, the teacher will appear.

quotes.author: Rumi
quotes.quote: Try not to resist the changes that come your way. Instead, let life live through you.

quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle
quotes.quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you ever have.
